title: Rose Gold Mangalsutra - 'Soubhagyarekha' Diamond Pendant
materials: Cubic Zirconia (CZ) Diamonds. Features our signature Hyderabadi Polish for enduring shine.
features: A contemporary take on the traditional Mangalsutra, this two-layered piece features delicate rose gold chains interspersed with meticulously strung black onyx beads. The lower strand culminates in a striking circular pendant, encrusted with sparkling Cubic Zirconia diamonds in a cluster setting. The upper strand features a floral CZ diamond accent. This design symbolizes the sacred bond of marriage with a modern aesthetic.
description: This Mangalsutra perfectly blends tradition with contemporary style. The rose gold finish provides a modern touch while retaining the cultural significance of the black onyx beads ('Nalla Pusalu'). The pendant's diamond cluster sparkles elegantly. Lightweight and durable, ideal for everyday wear. Represents commitment and prosperity.
